ivardefs.name: connectivity
ivardefs.desc: The entity that links the sugar residues together should also be captured for nearly all naturally occurring nucleic acid the linkage is a phosphate group. For many synthetic oligonucleotides phosphorothioate linkages are often seen. Linkage connectivity

ivardefs.name: identifier
ivardefs.desc: Each linkage will be registered as a fragment and have an ID.

ivardefs.name: name
ivardefs.desc: Each linkage will be registered as a fragment and have at least one name. A single name shall be assigned to each linkage.

ivardefs.name: residueSite
ivardefs.desc: Residues shall be captured as described in 5.3.6.8.3.

properties.desc: The linkages between sugar residues will also be captured.
